column5: Conversation and fishing with Jack tonight.  I love our short outings in the boat!   <iframe width="420" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/WCa-_dVdUuE" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
simply brilliant...brings back lots of memories
That's some fishing buddy you have! I had my son fishing at three and he's 34 now. Oh the memories. Great video!!!!!!!
Cute video, can't wait until my nephews are big enough to take fishing. The kid's a pro in the boat, you're gonna have quite the fisherman on your hands.
love it... cant wait to get my boat back from the mechanic and take my little guy out for his first ride...
I still enjoy it when my dad takes his "little" guy out.  We made it happen last fall and we'll have to do it again - while we still can.

Man, that net was a good investment. He loves that thing. Great vocabulary on the dude too! Priceless, Simon. Thanks bunches for sharing. Now I have to go finish some cement work before we get those bad dark clouds.
